ComicInfo.Summary: In 16th century China the Doctor, Sharon and K-9 discover evidence of alien weaponry having been used to slay pirates who were raiding coastal fishing villages, and are taken prisoner by Shaolin warrior monks who have slain the pirates, only to discover that the monks have fallen under the influence of a group of stranded Sontarans!
ComicInfo.Tags: Abslom Daak,Daleks,K-9,The Doctor,Sontarans,Time Lords,Ice Warriors,Taiyin,Sharon Davies,Cybermen
ComicInfo.Title: Dragon's Claw; Deathworld; Absalom Daak...Dalek-Killer Part 1
ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Gibbons,David Lloyd,Steve Dillon,Dave Gibbons,David Lloyd,Steve Dillon
ComicInfo.Inker: Dave Gibbons,David Lloyd,Steve Dillon,Dave Gibbons,David Lloyd,Steve Dillon
